name: Gas vs Dwarves
description:
DESCRIPTION

You are a small dragon and you are always hungry. Eat to grow! Dwarves and Gnomes invaded a cave which is your home and woke you up from hibernation. Make them pay.

  • Made with Unity during 72 hour Mash Up GameJam. Theme: Size Matters

CONTROLS

Use mouse to move.
Left Mouse Button for Boost.

AUTHORS

  •  Alexandra (Lexi) Šebestová - Programming
  • Martin (Ricky) Medvec - Programming
  • Pavol (Melkor) Červeniak - Art & Design
